HERO.NAME: Mustafa Gonen
HERO.INTRO_P1: With over 6 years of Frontend Development experience, I excel in Angular, Vue, TypeScript and optimizing web applications. Interested in contributing to innovative software solutions with a focus on high performance as a dedicated Software Developer. I am on track to complete my undergraduate degree in the Computer Engineering department of METU by the end of this year.

ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_SECTION.INTRO_P1: As a Frontend Developer, my greatest passion lies in designing and developing user-centric and creative web experiences. My curiosity for technology and my constant desire to learn continually drive me forward in this dynamic field.
ABOUT_SECTION.INTRO_P2: Throughout my career journey, with the experiences and projects I've gained, I aim to merge aesthetics and functionality in the digital world. I focus on developing accessible and high-performance applications by placing user experience at the core of my work.
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_1_DESC: I led the development of high-performance front-end solutions using Vue.js and Angular, collaborated with backend teams to optimize data flow, built reusable components, and integrated RESTful APIs to enhance user experience and reduce errors.
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_2_DESC: I led the development of multiple Angular-based user interfaces for international projects, collaborating with backend and UX/UI teams to deliver responsive, cross-browser solutions, optimize performance, and enhance code quality through reviews and reusable components
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_3_DESC: I contributed to a modern CMS by developing dynamic Angular UI components, implementing efficient video streaming architectures with WebRTC and WebSocket, improving collaboration through Git-based version control, and optimizing code quality with HTML5/CSS3 standards to reduce troubleshooting and development time.
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_4_DESC: During this internship, I learned the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and gained hands-on experience with modern frontend frameworks, particularly Angular.
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_5_DATE: SimBT Inc. Simulation Science and Technologies (2018)
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_5_DESC: I contributed to the design and development of a Corporate Information System for the HR department, working on both frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and backend (.NET/C# with MySQL) using Microsoft Visual Studio.
ABOUT_SECTION.TIMELINE_ITEM_6_DESC: Started Bachelor's degree program in Computer Engineering.

PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_1_DESC: A robust internal system designed for Hepsiburada’s logistics and operations teams to manage warehouse workflows, package handling, and delivery coordination. The application was deployed on a secure network and accessed via VPN by authorized personnel.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_2_DESC: A scalable, external-facing web platform developed for Hepsiburada’s business partners to organize shipment schedules, track package status, and streamline their delivery processes through a self-service interface.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_3_DESC: Developed two critical applications for ZES Zorlu, empowering internal teams and external partners through streamlined operational workflows and customer self-service functionalities. The platforms leveraged Angular on the frontend and .NET Core on the backend to ensure scalable and maintainable architectures.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_4_DESC: Developed a customer and service-provider facing platform connecting professional cleaners with homeowners, facilitating appointment scheduling, communication, and payments. The application was built with Angular for the frontend, ensuring an intuitive and smooth user experience.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_5_DESC: Developed an AI-driven application designed to assist users in analyzing and reviewing CVs with intelligent feedback, leveraging advanced natural language processing and chatbot technologies to enhance recruitment and career development processes.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_6_DESC: Spearheaded development of a comprehensive two-part application suite for Greyfood, supporting wholesalers, distributors, chain markets, and kiosks across B2B and B2C models. The frontend Angular applications were tightly integrated with a .NET Core backend to deliver seamless user experiences and robust operational features.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_7_DESC: Developed a comprehensive application facilitating the bidding, negotiation, and procurement processes for large-scale CNC machines. The platform streamlines supplier interactions and purchase management for industrial clients.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_8_DESC: Contributed to the development of a modern CMS leveraging Angular for the frontend and .NET Core for the backend. The system enabled flexible and reusable content creation by supporting unlimited websites, pages, and posts through dynamically configurable modules tailored for various university departments.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_9_DESC: Participated in the development of MEYDAN, a social media platform tailored to university communities, enabling users to create event posts, engage with content through likes, and stay updated on community activities..
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_10_DESC: Contributed to the full lifecycle development of a Learning Management System supporting remote education, featuring a Portal Module and a Live Lesson Module integrated with national and third-party video conferencing systems.
PROJECTS_SECTION.PROJECT_11_DESC: Actively contributed to the development of a high-performance National Video Conference System utilizing WebRTC technologies, designed to provide scalable and reliable real-time communication solutions.
